item.title: Grand Floridian Hotel Reviews Sentiment Analysis & NLP
item.description: Grand Floridian Hotel Reviews: Sentiment Analysis and NLP library(tidyverse) library(zoo) library(knitr) library(tidytext) library(SnowballC) library(keras) library(kableExtra) This is the raw version of the reviews data: it has the text content of the review, the star rating (1-5), and the date of stay (month/year). It requires a bit of cleaning to get in the form we want. #rename & change variable type rdf <- rdf %>% rename(stay_date = id_date, review = reviews) %>% mutate_at(vars(stay_date, review), ~ as.
